description: ***webOS 2.x / VEER / PIXI compatible! Space Dust for Palm® webOS™, combines use of the accelerometer and screen tap. Move the dust mite around space by tilting the phone while avoiding collisions with the enemy (Palm cell phone competitors). Tap the enemy to kill them and move on to additional levels. Avoid all objects, some are enemies and can be killed, others are not. As you advance, the levels become more difficult to conquer. Higher levels become very intense. Space Dust also automatically saves and updates your highest score for as long as the application exists on the phone. You can turn off game sounds by going to Settings in the app menu. As always, Help is available through the app menu and you can refer to the Faq for simple instructions. Please do not hesitate to E-Mail us regarding any questions, comments, or suggestions, we welcome your feedback and look forward to your input. We are looking for more ideas and additional game play scenarios or ideas, please, e-mail us and help us make it better, this is a completely original game and we want to provide more updates, more levels, other challenges, etc. Game was originally intended for children or adults who are not hard core gamers. This is NOT a game like DOOM / GUITAR HERO or ANGRY BIRDS. If you want a mindless, activity that you can do while doing almost anything else…Get ready to get Dusted!!!
